website_summaries.verdict: A compact pair of energy efficient off road lamps that fit on smaller off road vehicles such as motorcycles and ATVs.
pros: The light cast of the lamp creates a spot effect
Good for seeing further out in front while driving in dark conditions
Heat sink in back allows the light to stay cooler than other similarly-sized lights
cons: The pair of lights are difficult to focus and position correctly for the best forward illumination

customer_reviews.title: These are AWESOME trail lights - absolutely SPOT not FLOOD!
customer_reviews.text: I got a pair of these mounted on my Stubby front bumper and wow.. they really do a great job of throwing light down the road. They do have some flare on the side but these throw 3-4 times farther than my JK headlights on high beam, and I am being VERY conservative. I also bought a pair of 144 watt 4 inch square pods for my windshield mounts, These were supposed to be spot beams.. Nope. They are triple the power of the lights in my review and do nothing but light up the moths and attach bugs. Im returning the 4 inchers and going for 2 more of these. Love these lights!
customer_reviews.author: G1yp4.1337

customer_reviews.title: 2PACK 7" LED Offroad Pod Lights Bar 51W
customer_reviews.text: These are great lights, I use them as fog lights on my Jeep JKU wired to the fog light switch on the turn signal. They are bright but not too bright. They are not "turn the night into day" bright though. One thing you need to do before installing is put silicone around the lens. Mine has developed condensation after a crazy blizzard we had about a week after I installed them. Not a deal breaker, just use some silicone and you'll be happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: M. Frady

customer_reviews.title: and they work great. They're extremely bright and have a good spread
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my Subaru Forester to put on the bull bar I have, and they work great. They're extremely bright and have a good spread, and for the price they outdid my expectations for sure. They look good too! The only downside so far is that the red is starting to fade from the sun. My car is kept outside, and I've had them on for about three months now. I'll most likely end up disassembling them and repainted the red part (being careful of seals, of course.) I would definitely recommend these to anyone looking for offroad lights for their ride!
customer_reviews.author: Crouse

customer_reviews.title: Actually bright LEDs.
customer_reviews.text: They have a nice solid feel and have a small gasket keeping water out. They’re much brighter than I thought they’d be. I have four of these on my jeep’s Roof rack and I lit up an entire acre lot. There’s a little wind noise but not much. The only downside is I wish the mounting bracket was smaller or more flush. These lights are more of a focused flood instead of a focused spot, which I think is actually better. Who needs a tiny spot that lights up 5’ wide 300ft away. I’d rather have this light that lights up 40’ wide at 150’ away. Great buy for the money.
customer_reviews.author: IAHphotog

customer_reviews.title: “Just look at them glow”
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, the lights were cheap in price, but the feel heavy duty. Replaced 2 hella 7” with these because I was sick of buying bulbs. I like the look of these better, SharkBait (my cars name) I think is going to get two more soon haha. They were very easy to setup, I just used the pre-existing wiring from my Hellas and they just hooked right up. They are bright. I’ll update when I drive in the dark, but so far really good. Also they shipped and arrived way before expected. Update: they are amazing at night, flood light but super bright
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, like really good.
customer_reviews.text: I had to get creative to make the brackets to install on my Ford Ranger with a 3 inch body lift but I wired into my highbeams to use on backroads at night. They are bright and go well with a red colored truck. These are actually the second pair I've purchased, the first were installed behind the grille of a 01 Ranger.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: The only problem is that I dont have enough toys to put these on.
customer_reviews.text: As my headline says, I want more toys to put these lights on. I put the set I purchased on my motorcycle, as half of my riding takes place after 11pm at night through the countryside to and from work. These lights have probably saved my life and skin a few times, being able to see critters and deer from father away gives me much more time to react. As for installation, super easy. Wire in the switch to the battery, a fuse and the lights. Maybe 15 minutes for a competent electrician or mechanic.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking but poor quality
customer_reviews.text: It gave my truck a really nice look when I first installed it the problem begins after a few month after, I notice the glasswork was getting yellow and its brightness deemed a little. as you can see in the picture the case a still looking nice but the glass just makes it look an old peace of crap. I was exited at first but the deception is bigger now! there is not customer service.
customer_reviews.author: EDDY NUNES

customer_reviews.title: Bright and Look Great
customer_reviews.text: Nice even flood light. It is not going to throw light way down the road. Go with spot lights if that’s your intention. They look great, feel sturdy, and well made. We’ll see how they hold up in the long run but after a week with them I can’t complain.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hooker

customer_reviews.title: Good lights
customer_reviews.text: They look Good and are brighter them my normal headlights, seem pretty solid so far no leaks yet. Wish they were a little brighter but all in all for the price I would recommend. But I’m only planing on using them for now I want to get a set of Baja design but that’s just not in my price range at this time. So for now they are exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Levi D.

customer_reviews.title: Great Light, BRIGHT, functional and the best value!
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend these, they are BRIGHT, the price point is second to none for the quality you receive! I went ahead and did the silicone around the contact points to ensure they did not leak water like others have stated. A little preventative maintenance will go a long ways!
customer_reviews.author: TexsunFU

customer_reviews.title: They work great for an ATV
customer_reviews.text: Love these headlights with the red trim. They are very bright and the quality seems fairly reasonable for the price. These were purchased for a 2004 Honda TRX450R for riding sand dunes at night as the factory headlights aren't that bright. I was able to wire these fairly easy into the factory high beams. Can easily be taken off and switched back to factory look. Took one star off only because one of the red trim pieces looks like something small hit it when the paint was still wet but hardly noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Outperformed all expectations for the money!
customer_reviews.text: My friends warned me against buying cheap accessory lights that you get what you pay for. And I honestly just bought these as a place holder until I could save up for better ones, because my bumper looked naked without them. Boy was I surprised! These things are almost as bright as my buddies light cannons that he spent $780 for! The mounting hardware is way too small to be effective in a bumper mount but all you need to do is put a piece of rubber hose around the bolt and use fender washers and you’re golden.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: BRIGHT
customer_reviews.text: Bright. The leds dont travel too far but thats alright. I would guess maybe 1000 yards. Thats great in the woods and alright for a field. 100% would buy again. I had these on my 4runner then took them off to put on my new truck when i sold my 4runner. I love these.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Pressey

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: Very, very bright and very cool looking! I get lots of compliments on these. Quality seems OK (for a $40 pair of color matching lights) but the light output is perfect. I still haven't fine-tuned the aiming of mine, but even generally aimed, they put out some serious light. I will update these after the season is over and they have been used and abused some more...
customer_reviews.author: Travis T.

customer_reviews.title: Lasted a year
customer_reviews.text: Lights are bright and cost effective. One year in I have some LED’s going out on one light. No river crossings or water usage/submersion. Might be better off paying a bit more for more reliability.
customer_reviews.author: Leesa Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Good but
customer_reviews.text: So I have had these for about a year. They are still working and bright the issues I see are the mounting hardware rusts really bad I will be upgrading that for sure. The other issue is the red painted trim looks great at first but will start to chip and the metal under it oxidizes quickly. Basically good for the money but cosmetically will not hold up. But for this price they are ok.
customer_reviews.author: Kai Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: Great lights, customizable trim color!
customer_reviews.text: Love these lights! They replaced the stock fog lights on my 1999 Jeep Wrangler, they are way brighter than the stock ones and look better too. The LED sure is nice because they don’t get as hot as the factory lights as well. I didn’t like the red color so 6 bolts, a light scuff and I was able to paint the trim ring purple
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Cant beat the price.
customer_reviews.text: About a year later one has some moisture but it still works and for the price I'm still way ahead. They are not long distance spot likes likebthebname brand but it's just right for me to see what I need in the southwest.
customer_reviews.author: Ty B

customer_reviews.title: need replacement due to over heating and almost fire
customer_reviews.text: I have a pair that completely stopped working and almost caught fire due to over heating...I cannot get anybody to replace item
customer_reviews.author: pdd

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: They work awesome and are very bright FLOOD Lights. I only gave 4 stars because the brackets that come with it do not tighten to the point where the lights can not tilt forward or backwards. They are pretty firm but I find myself pushing them forward or backward slights about every other day.
customer_reviews.author: Danyelle

customer_reviews.title: Nice wide flood light, no real distance tho.
customer_reviews.text: Not strong enough for the lumens output. The focal lenses are barely existant. Its the lens that makes the light usable. These dont go any further than my cars low beams, but they sure do look nice when off! I am keeping them, but putting back on my feniex lights.
customer_reviews.author: Lowcountry LawMan

customer_reviews.title: BRIGHT!
customer_reviews.text: Nice heavy light but the wiring is substandard and will have to replace. The mounting bracket is metal in the white, no rubber pad or grommet to place between bumper and bracket. Will need painting and found or fabricate a grommet. But then the price was reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: H. David Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Great value. Perfect as an auxiliary Jeep backup light.
customer_reviews.text: Really durable and quite bright. I mount them under the rear bumper of my Jeep TJ as a better reverse light. Not showing any wear at all so far, and I generally am parked outside in the elements.
customer_reviews.author: Nateboogie

customer_reviews.title: Good looking, fair price
customer_reviews.text: ARB look, cheap price. Good quality and excellent for off-road. I have tested proof these lights. I would definitely commend.
customer_reviews.author: xiaohan

customer_reviews.title: disappointed but worth the money as they are CHEAP
customer_reviews.text: I had a set of these on my previous jeep mounted in the same location and I was very happy with them. The newest set I install on my new Jeep kinda fell flat. They are more of a flood type pattern and i was looking for something that was more spot or driving beam. They do well if you angle them off to the sides , but even as flood beams they seem to lack punch.
customer_reviews.author: Brian D.

customer_reviews.title: Not very bright.
customer_reviews.text: They do the job but I'm a little disappointed in the brightness. Overall they are alright but I feel like I could have gotten something brighter for my money.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Mull

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: There are no wiring harnesses or switches and they simply aren’t that bright. They look cool on my red Jeep but that’s about it. 😁
customer_reviews.author: BWR

customer_reviews.title: Must haves for a Jeep
customer_reviews.text: These things are nice and super bright the only reason I get four stars is the paint of the red looks hand-painted and not evenly across beyond that it's a great product wish I would have got the black ones instead of the red though
customer_reviews.author: Barry S

customer_reviews.title: I love these; they look great
customer_reviews.text: I love these; they look great, but I really need to find replacement lenses for them. I have a crack in one of the lenses and just need to swap out one of the lenses for a new one. Any ideas? Manufacturer, can you please offer these? Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua E. Hanrahan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome value
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 sets one in red for my Jeep and a set for Motorhome. They look and work awesome. What a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Eschker

customer_reviews.title: Look good but do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Was pretty excited to get these and get them on my Jeep but upon opening the package I discovered both lenses are cracked right out of the box.... pretty disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob JB

customer_reviews.title: Good Light, Good Price
customer_reviews.text: Great product and the mounting bracket was black instead of silver! These lights are more of a driving light than a spot, I saw videos on this and was expecting this, for an ATV/UTV they are more of a flood light. The light is bright and the mounting bracket is solid, Looks great on the rzr and when combined with the head lights they put out plenty of light to see whats in front of the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a good value.
customer_reviews.text: I put these on my hunting rig and have been nothing but pleased with them for almost 2 years now. No discoloration or moisture issues and they have worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Clayton

customer_reviews.title: leakage
customer_reviews.text: These lights are not even a year old and they have condensation in the lenses. They started to get condensation in them two months ago, and are getting worse. No response from buyer.
customer_reviews.author: John S.

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit in my ranch hand bumper. May not be as bright as I wanted, but have only tested in garage. True test will be on the road in a couple weeks
customer_reviews.author: guy w brummet

customer_reviews.title: See below
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Super bright, works well in fog or heavy snow/rain Cons: Color around rim faded quickly. Beware that it doesn't come with a harness, so you'll have to buy one yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Se M

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat these fog lights for the price. I noticed some people complaining about water getting in so I went ahead and out silicone along the outside. Would be nice if it came with an assembly or if the wires were a bit longer but i am def happy.
customer_reviews.author: Craig D.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing PaintPeel
customer_reviews.text: They have been on my Jeep for about a month and the paint is already peeling off the back fins.
customer_reviews.author: Chris H

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I put 6 on the front of my 2019 ram 2500 4x4 and they are freaken awesume. Pictures to come
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Troy L. Arrington

customer_reviews.title: Great value and really bright
customer_reviews.text: I installed these on a 2011 Jeep in 5 minutes. They are well made and really bright. Great product and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: water was in light after only a couple months now ...
customer_reviews.text: water was in light after only a couple months now one of the lights do not work....you get what you pay for i would pass on these cheap lights
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are very high-quality they’re not terrible but they’re not very good either.
customer_reviews.text: These are very high-quality they’re not terrible but they’re not very good either.
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: These lights are amazing
customer_reviews.text: These lights are amazing. The first photo is with just my headlights on. The second photo is with the LED off-road lights on. I purchased four of these to put on top of my truck.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Bright as hell!
customer_reviews.text: Put four on my roof rack. Great for letting other drivers know their brights are on...and dark roads.
customer_reviews.author: justin Torres

customer_reviews.title: Big and Bright
customer_reviews.text: I put them on my UTV, so a lot bigger than expected. Happy with the brightness and cool look.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Not sealed well
customer_reviews.text: Only on my vehicle a couple months & there is condensation in one of the lights & the plastic is starting to crack. I have only actually run the lights 3 times.
customer_reviews.author: Braden Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Very bright for a few bucks.
customer_reviews.text: I love the lights. They are very bright for a reasonable price and they look good too. I could only give 4 star’s because I ordered 4 and two of them had noticeable chips in the red finish.
customer_reviews.author: LARRY

customer_reviews.title: They sent a used item
customer_reviews.text: One of the light you can clearly see is a return item has chipped paint multiple corners and inside the glass there is hair!!! Not happy at all.
customer_reviews.author: Cengiz Emre

customer_reviews.title: nice lights but...
customer_reviews.text: The kit is incomplete. One light bracket is missing all but 1 bolt and 0 nuts or washers included. The other has all 3 bolts, still no nuts or washers. At least the lights work (for now)
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Baker

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the money
customer_reviews.text: Overall great product for the money although I did expect them to be brighter.
customer_reviews.author: Dave T

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: These lights are not that bright at all or maybe it could be they just project light in a very wide flood pattern but for the price oh well I do like how they look and they are a very thin built light don’t feel cheap and ever since ive had them they have been rained on nearly every day and no moisture in them yet Over all they are a pretty cool looking light but the light pattern sucks
customer_reviews.author: robert bond

customer_reviews.title: These lights mount very easy if you have basic wiring experiance
customer_reviews.text: The lights were just as I expected and work very well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price.  And very bright
customer_reviews.text: These lights are very bright. I put them on my jeep. Man what a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bright!
customer_reviews.text: Everything you need in a compact package for a price that can’t be beat
customer_reviews.author: Holly Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product / Linked to my High Beam switch these ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing Product / Linked to my High Beam switch these things get me a Flood/Spot coverage 180degree with down the middle spot i can see 150ft clearly ( hoping these preform long term ) I have these on the outside my grill on a 2000 crown vic
customer_reviews.author: Steven M. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for quads!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome for a quad at night! You will see a deer 6 miles out! Haha
customer_reviews.author: Allan McKinney

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: The quality and light projection exceeded my expectations. For the price these are a smoking deal!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan T

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive and bright
customer_reviews.text: These are very bright and will light the area up very nicely
customer_reviews.author: Leslie D. Cappama

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and bright lights
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son’s side by side for Christmas and he loves them. Surprised at how bright they are.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are NOT PIAA lights, so don't expect the ...
customer_reviews.text: These are NOT PIAA lights, so don't expect the same quality. The mounting bolts are mixed matched threads. The lights are low quality, but complete the "look" if that's what u are after
customer_reviews.author: Scott L.

customer_reviews.title: Must have on any Vehicle.
customer_reviews.text: Light are made of metal not cheap plastic , really bright I get complement everywhere I want to be a seller of this product light looks Amazing I bought the install hardware made wiring a breeze..
customer_reviews.author: Bill Mc

customer_reviews.title: looks good works great
customer_reviews.text: looks good works great. Had to buy stainless steel bolts as the ones sent were not a good fit. no big deal though as I always have a use for mounting bolts.
customer_reviews.author: Grum-Pias

customer_reviews.title: Great bargain
customer_reviews.text: Nice bright lights that seem to come with what appears to be stainless hardware vs steel... great value and performance
customer_reviews.author: Wayne A. Lebelle

customer_reviews.title: Good price, well made We would recommend them.
customer_reviews.text: Very well make, heavy duty. Turned out to be too big for my car, but my husband will use them on his truck.
customer_reviews.author: K Goose

customer_reviews.title: Colored leds?
customer_reviews.text: Both lights work real good except for one is slightly purple and the other one is White and I know that's normal is it supposed to be like that? Other than that everything works I even tested it on my jump box just in case it was a ground or something still slightly purple.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Day light in the woods
customer_reviews.text: Very bright in the woods have room for 2 more so I’m going to get them
customer_reviews.author: David Bourgade

customer_reviews.title: Ok but...
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered spot lights, I think I was sent flood lights. Decent but I wanted more of a spot light focus
customer_reviews.author: Reggie

customer_reviews.title: Bad luck??
customer_reviews.text: Water invsion on week 1 of installed. Sealed with outdoor rated black solicone to prevent water invation now one of the 2 has lens cracked.
customer_reviews.author: FRED GUERRA

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Really like this product, although I do wish I spent the extra money for the black ones. Very bright and my only really complaint is the size. These things are absolutely massive, great for trucks.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Lukaszewski

customer_reviews.title: Let there be light!
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my old lights with these 7" LED Offroad Pod Lights. They are incredible! They look tough and the lighting makes such a big difference.
customer_reviews.author: SASSY

customer_reviews.title: They are ok
customer_reviews.text: The lights start leaking water into the lense. And they crack from hitting a small bug on the rode
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome price andd extremely bright.
customer_reviews.text: These were a birthday gift for my brother. He loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Briones

customer_reviews.title: Nice bright lights
customer_reviews.text: I put these lights on a golf cart truck. They are very bright. Great for headlights on it.
customer_reviews.author: Rusty

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: More like a flood light I painted the red black
customer_reviews.author: usernames and passwords and see if you can get it to me by the end of the day

customer_reviews.title: Not bright
customer_reviews.text: Idk what I was expecting but these are not bright in the slightest. With my headlights on you can’t even tell these are on as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: Enjoyed very much very easy to install but you have to replace then nuts and volts they provide you with with stainless steel
customer_reviews.author: Swampgator

customer_reviews.title: Junk quality
customer_reviews.text: Total junk,drove for three weeks and led metal holder cracked while i was driving,messed up my light!!! Avoid
customer_reviews.author: Edward Keblys

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: super bright and love the red ring. looks great on my truck
customer_reviews.author: Mary Callaway

customer_reviews.title: I was surprised
customer_reviews.text: Better than I thought they were gonna be I’m gonna definitely buy another set to add on
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Great lights
customer_reviews.text: Great lights for fog light not so much as a spot light, very bright and and wide range not much distance though, doesnt come with connections to install so you need to buy that separate
customer_reviews.author: Chris Antonio

customer_reviews.title: With buying these lights
customer_reviews.text: Love these light got 6 of them and they are bright can light up my entire block work great even when wheeling out in the pitch dark I can lead the way
customer_reviews.author: frank

customer_reviews.title: Great spotlights for a small price
customer_reviews.text: Works great very bright hardware will rust needs to be stainless steel
customer_reviews.author: Ken_turf

customer_reviews.title: Low quality.
customer_reviews.text: Low quality. After 4 months stop working, also it's getting rusted. Not waterproof
customer_reviews.author: Yasin

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a decent product for the price appear to be bright good looking design
customer_reviews.author: ap

customer_reviews.title: Hardware
customer_reviews.text: Should have bigger diameter bolt that's mount light to bracket. Otherwise nice product.

customer_reviews.title: Not A Spot Light
customer_reviews.text: This is More of a Flood light then a spot. Disappointed it's not what's described.

customer_reviews.title: Awesomeness
customer_reviews.text: What a bargain. These bad boys are stout, and heavy. No questioning the construction. They look as good as they are built

customer_reviews.title: Missing mounting plates
customer_reviews.text: The package came with two lights and only enough hardware to install one. Only coming with one bracket ruined the intentions that I previously had. Would not buy again.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love them! Look mean and super bright, planning to order another set for the bumper

customer_reviews.text: BRIGHT AND LOOK AWESOME BUT WILL NOT FIT INSIDE A BULL BAR

customer_reviews.title: Great price and value
customer_reviews.text: Best off road lights for the price you are ever going to find.

customer_reviews.title: Well built, fairly bright
customer_reviews.text: Lights are as pictured above, sturdy, and well built. Both pair of lights worked. Light beam is very wide, and fairly bright.

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied
customer_reviews.text: One of the lights leds don’t work and the other one looks like a strobe light so I don’t have use for them try to contact the company and haven’t got any help yea like everyone says u get what u pay for...
customer_reviews.author: Irving Marin

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the paint could be better as I received it with some chipping edges. But over all they look great
customer_reviews.author: yousef

customer_reviews.title: Love these!!
customer_reviews.text: So far... I love these. Right size, right brightness, just right!!!

customer_reviews.title: Very bright
customer_reviews.text: Very bright, I got the flood ones, next I will get some spot lights.
customer_reviews.author: jeffrey haughey

customer_reviews.title: Don’t do it
customer_reviews.text: Cheap / not worth the money still waiting to hear back about a refund /paint peeling off right out of the box

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: 4 months in only 1/2 the lights are working. Not impressed with quality.
customer_reviews.author: Hank

customer_reviews.title: Check to make sure all of the parts are there before you start installation!!!
customer_reviews.text: Product was exactly as described, however on of the packages was missing parts, a missing lock-washer. Annoying, but not an expensive issue to fix.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: 2PACK 7" LED Offroad Pod Lights Bar 51W with Mounting Bracket, Red Round Spot Bumper Driving Lamp Headlight Fog Light for Offroader, Truck, Car, ATV, SUV, Jeep, Construction, Camping, Hunters
feature_bullets: [SUPER BRIGHT] - The 7" round work light has powerful LEDs that produce 5100 raw lumens of pure white light.
[SAY GOODBYE to FOGGY LENSES] - IP68 rated waterproof & dustproof, durable enough to withstand any harsh environments.
[SPOT BEAM] - Spot beam throws focused light to add punch down the middle of the lane, extreme distance through the dark.
